name: Number Horde
description:
Life was never really the same after that fateful day. Mr.Hunnicutt shared his home made pie in his middle school math class. Little did the students know they would become the carriers of the terrible virus PI-20 reducing them anyone who has ever suffered due to math into walking zombies. Fight back the waves with the zombie's only weakness, math. After all, the corgi is good RNG.

Made for the PIGSquad#summerslowjams

This game is meant to be played while streamed. The game is downloaded by a host while players connect via number-horde-client. Be warned, difficulty scales with players!

Huge thank you to all those who helped, my DMs who let us skip role play sessions to get this done, and the PIGSquad team.

Also, it's probably bug ridden. Probably.
